response.answer_text: Jio Glass is a wearable device that supports Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality capabilities. Jio Glass pairs up with a mobile phone (similar to other wearables), to extend the capabilities of the mobile device. For example, if Jio Glass pairs up with a 5G phone, it would leverage 5G capabilities of the mobile device. Moreover, use-cases such as Augmented, Virtual Reality and Hologram works very well with a 5G device. It will work with 4G phones too.
